# isPlayable

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the asset has playable content.

## Declaration

```swift
var isPlayable: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

This property value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if you can use the asset to create an [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVPlayerItem].
title: isPlayable
